name: The Exploring Wizard
description:
The Exploring Wizard is a Roguelike Twin-Stick Shooter. You are a wizard exploring the world and fighting enemies as you go through the world. See how long you can survive against different enemies. 

There are five different landscapes as you can see from the images to the right. Each Time you level up you will encounter a new landscape and the music will also change!

Controls

WASD to move

Spacebar to deploy a bomb

Arrow Keys to Shoot

Press "P" to Pause the Game.

Have fun and enjoy!

Slight Bug needs to be fixed. Hit "P" button after restarting the game.
